Description: Ibanez EGEN8 Herman Li ModelAn authentic Ibanez EGEN8 I purchased used at a second hand store. I've cleaned it up as much as I could and replaced any missing parts. There are several blemishes like small nicks and some abrasion from use prior to purchasing it but the guitar is fully functional. I've installed some very nice golden strap locks that match the hardware. This model sells for much higher in new or excellent condition, this is your opportunity to snag one for a decent discount! Specs:Model name: EGEN8 Herman Li Signature Electric GuitarModel number: EGEN8PLBBody style: solid-body electricTop: flamed mapleBody: mahoganyColor: platinum blondeNeck material: 3-piece mapleNeck type: EGEN bolt-onNeck Shape: Wizard IIFrets: 24 large fretsFingerboard: rosewoodInlay: abalone oval inlaysBridge: Edge III tremoloBridge pickup: VINTAGE 8 humbuckerMiddle pickup: SINGLE 1Neck pickup: VINTAGE 7 humbuckerControls: 1 volume with push down Hi-Pass filter switch, 1 tone with push-pull coil tap switch, 5-way blade selectorHardware: goldTuners: Die-case
Title: Ibanez EGEN8 Herman Li Model Dragonforce
